name: Memorize what's -NOT- real
description:
The idea of the game is very simple.

There are 3 different stages.

Look Stage - Beginning of the game to memorize the stage

Sleep Phase - 1 Random object will appear -NOT ALWAYS- which you have to identify in the...

Selection Phase - Once identified click it and press Select - if correct another sleep phase will start - if false you will loose a life and have to guess again.

Tips - Sometimes no new object will spawn. you have to select the previous one again!

Weird things can happen during sleep phase. Beware of ghosts! Scare them off (Left click!) to bring back the light.

Use the "Custom" play mode for an individual experience!

Can you beat "Hard"? ;) I could not...

--- Is the object you choose real? ---

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING AND RATING MY GAME! Will have a look at your game too, for sure!!!

Uploaded a zip file too, if you want to download and/or have problems in browser.

Assets:

Art: Done by myself in Aseprite/ I reused some sprites from the previous GameJam in 2021.

Color Palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/resurrect-64

Music & Sounds: Got ALL my sounds + soundtrack from https://www.zapsplat.com

Controls:

Only Left Click needed! 

Peace!
